passErr.1: Must contain uppercase, lowercase letters and numbers and be between 8 and 24

identical.1: Must match the first password input field

classification.title: Soil classification
classification.text: Enter a picture of your soil to help you identify its type.

safety.title: Crop Safety
safety.text: Enter a picture of your crop to help you identify the type of disease and suggest a treatment for it.

recommendation.title: Crop Recommendation
recommendation.text: We suggest some crops that suit you by knowing your location,soil type,and air temperature.

quality.title: Soil Quality
quality.text: We help you judge whether the soil is suitable for cultivation or not by its analysis.

risks.title: Crop risks and treatments
risks.text: We display information about your cultivated crop,common diseases and methods of treatment

nursery.title: The nearest nursery
nursery.text: We suggest the nearest nursery to you to get the crops you need.

lab.title: The nearest laboratory
lab.text: We suggest the nearest analysis laboratory to your location in order to conduct analzyes of your soil.

fertilizer.title: Fertilizer and treatment
fertilizer.text: We suggest the nearest nursery to buy fertilizers and treatment for your crop.

soil-fertilizer.title: Soil fertilizer
soil-fertilizer.text: We suggest appropriate fertizers by identifying your location,soil type, air temperature around you and the cultivated crop.

agriwise.1: AgriWise is an application and website based on AI that helps to increase agriclutural production.

mail.1: An email with your account confirmation link sent to your email
